common.no_search_results_description: We couldn't find any results for your search

trunks.title: Trunk routing rules
trunks.confirm_delete_rule_message: Deleting this rule will remove its routing configuration permanently
trunks.no_trunks_description: Start by adding a rule to route calls based on phone number prefix
trunks.configure_trunk_description: Create a new rule to route calls based on a number prefix (root)
trunks.root_helper: Enter the number prefix that triggers this rule
trunks.providers_are_missing_description: You must install and configure at least one NethVoice application on this node before you can create trunk routing rules.

settings.title: Settings
settings.fqdn_helper: FQDN of the instance. Must be a valid domain name
settings.address_helper: IPv4 address expected to receive VoIP traffic
settings.address_and_iface_dont_match_message: For the devices in the PBX local network to work correctly, the 'Hairpin NAT' feature — also known as 'NAT reflection', 'NAT hairpinning', 'NAT on a stick' or 'Loopback NAT' — must be enabled on the firewall (specifically, on the device that manages the NAT of the public IP).
settings.address_tooltip: This is required only if it differs from @:settings.interface address. The address is filled automatically based on the resolved FQDN above, but you can change it if needed.

error.root_invalid_alphanumeric_format: The root name must be alphanumeric (letters and numbers only)
error.root_already_exists: A rule with this root name already exists
error.address_cannot_be_same_as_iface: Enter the public IP address only if it differs from the network interface IP address
